readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.11/f Haley 500/p Haley/p Emily: 50s/6 20/farmer -10 -10 0 Haley 5 20 1 Emily 8 20 3/skippable/pause 1000/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "呃啊啊！老是我打扫坐垫下面！这周轮到你了！$a"/emote Emily 12/speak Emily "你真孩子气，海莉。这房子里大部分的家务都是我做的，你心知肚明。$u"/pause 200/warp farmer 2 24/playSound doorClose/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "哦，是那个新来的农场男孩。$7^哦，是那个新来的农场女孩。$7"/faceDirection Emily 3/speak Emily "他有名字的。$u^她有名字的。$u"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "嘿，你会理解我的。"/emote farmer 8/speak Emily "*唉*……抱歉把你牵扯进来了，@。海莉在抱怨我让她打扫坐垫下面。$u"/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "$q 45 null#那是因为上周是我打扫的！$a#$r 46 -50 Event_clean2#少废话，赶紧打扫！#$r 45 30 Event_clean1#海莉，何不每周固定打扫一次呢？#$r 46 -30 Event_clean3#艾米丽，这次就去打扫吧。"/fork haleyWontDoIt/stopMusic/faceDirection Haley 3/emote Haley 12/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "好吧，你赢了。不出意外这就成了我每周的工作了。然后就不用再争吵了。$u"/faceDirection Haley 2/speak Emily "非常感谢。@。圆满解决了呢。$h"/pause 1000/end
content.haleyWontDoIt: move Haley -2 0 0/move Haley 0 -2 0/emote Haley 12/faceDirection Emily 1/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "*唉*……那我去打扫吧……$s"/pause 1000/end
content.12/f Haley 1000/p Haley: ragtime/-1000 -1000/farmer 16 20 1 Haley 18 16 0/skippable/showFrame Haley 20/shake Haley 500/viewport 15 16 true/pause 500/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "唔嗯嗯嗯……我打不开这个罐子！$a#$b#……$s"/pause 400/shake Haley 500/move farmer 0 -4 1/shake Haley 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/showFrame Haley 21/emote Haley 16/speak Haley "噢！是你啊……@对吧？"/pause 1000/speak Haley "$q 47 null#话说……你挺有劲的，对吧？#$r 47 30 Event_jar1#是#$r 47 -30 Event_jar2#不是"/faceDirection Haley 3/animate farmer false true 100 111/pause 400/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 500/stopJittering/pause 200/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 500/stopJittering/pause 200/playSound fishingRodBend/startJittering/pause 2000/stopJittering/playSound coin/stopAnimation farmer/animate farmer false true 100 112/jump farmer/pause 1500/pause 200/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Haley 21/speak Haley "你还真打开了诶！你比看起来还要强壮！$h"/pause 400/emote farmer 12/pause 500/emote Haley 20/pause 500/speak Haley "谢谢！$h"/pause 500/end

Event_darkroom2#这是干什么的？#$r -1 -50 Event_darkroom3#我见过比这更好的。"/faceDirection Haley 0/emote Haley 40/pause 500/speak Haley "唔……话说回来……有什么事吗？$s"/faceDirection Haley 0/question haleyDarkRoom Emily "请进@！我要向你展示一样东西。$h"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Emily "这是我的一个秘密爱好……我已经练习好几个月了。#$b#现在，坐好，放松，想象自己被带到一个很美好的地方……好了吗？"/stopMusic/pause 600/move Emily 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 1000/animate Emily false true 300 50 51/pause 1600/speak Emily "$q 213 null#所以……*喘气*……你感觉怎么样？$h#$r 213 25 event_dance1#这太奇妙了！#$r 213 -50 event_dance2#真尴尬……#$r 213 25 event_dance1#（保持沉默并缓缓鼓掌）"/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "唷……这东西太消耗体力了……$u"/pause 500/stopAnimation Emily/showFrame Emily 0/pause 1000/animate Emily false true 100 48 49/pause 1000/speak Emily "自从我在阿比盖尔的毕业典礼上点了一盘胡椒食物后，我再也没有出过这么多汗！$h"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Emily/speak Emily "……嗯，我最好洗个澡。感谢你来看我表演。"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/end dialogue Emily "不要将跳舞的事告诉任何人。只有你能看。"
content.471942/f Emily 500/p Emily: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 20 4 3/skippable/showFrame Emily 33/specificTemporarySprite EmilySleeping/viewport 19 4 true/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/viewport move 0 -1 5000/pause 1000/globalFade .004/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic EmilyDream/changeToTemporaryMap EmilyDreamscape false/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp Emily 21 11/warp farmer 22 15/animate Emily false true 500 24 25/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport move 0 -1 7000/viewport 21 18/pause 8000/textAboveHead Emily "阿弥-陀佛"/pause 4000/textAboveHead Emily "阿弥弥弥-陀佛"/pause 5000/playSound yoba/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 600/stopAnimation Emily/showFrame Emily 26/jump Emily/shake Emily 1000/pause 1000/showFrame Emily 0/pause 500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 2/pause 1000/emote Emily 8/pause 500/speak Emily "您怎么会在这里？$u"/pause 1000/move Emily 0 2 2/viewport move 0 1 1500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite EmilySign/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 8000/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/speak Emily "……$u#$b#这让我想到了一件事。$u#$b#即使最细微、柔和、单纯的光线中也会藏有一个奇妙的秘密。"/pause 1000/speak Emily "现在我知道你为什么在这里了。这是一个迹象。哈哈哈！$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/startJittering/pause 1000/playSound coin/stopJittering/warp farmer -1000 -1000/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 50/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Emily 2/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade .005/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/changeLocation HaleyHouse/warp Emily 20 4/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport 20 3/pause 3000/move Emily -2 0 2/move Emily 0 3 2/pause 2000/speak Emily "@……有些特别的@……$u#$b#我们的命运将交织在一起……$u"/pause 1500/end
content.195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0/pause 1000/message "出于某些原因，你决定把手放到口袋里……"/pause 500/message "你摸着兔子的脚，感觉如释重负……"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "嗨！"/textAboveHead Abigail "嘿！"/textAboveHead Leah "看谁来了！"/pause 2000/move farmer 4 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Abigail "我们刚才在聊刘易斯镇长和玛妮的八卦……$h"/pause 500/speak Penny "我个人觉得他们之间没有什么猫腻……"/pause 500/speak Haley "哈！你太天真了吧？$h"/jump Penny/emote Penny 12/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和女生小团体待了一会儿。"/pause 1000/message "这次聚会无事发生！"/pause 500/end
content.195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0 Pierre -1000 -1000 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "别跑那么快！"/textAboveHead Abigail "别动！"/textAboveHead Leah "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Abigail "呵，没想到你所有的“女朋友”会出现在一个房间里吧，@？$a"/pause 500/speak Leah "我……我还以为你和其他男人不一样……$s^你骗取了我们所有人的爱……你真是太可怕了……$a"/pause 500/speak Penny "你怎么能这样对我们，@？$s"/pause 500/speak Maru "你真觉得自己是情场高手，是吗？以为自己游刃有余、如鱼得水？真是个花心大萝卜……$a"/pause 500/speak Emily "那……那天晚上在帐篷里……黑暗中你在我耳边轻声说了那么多甜言蜜语……$s#$b#原来一切都是谎言，现在知道真相的我，该如何面对每一天……$s"/pause 500/playMusic ragtime/speak Haley "好了，我们女人要团结起来！我们不能忍受这种事情！$a^我们不会再忍受你的伤害了！$a"/textAboveHead Leah "没错！"/pause 500/speak Abigail "嗯？你还有什么要为自己辩解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#对不起……我以前做错了。#女士们，冷静一下！我可以解释……"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Maru "哼……"/pause 500/speak Abigail "说得好听，但这事不能就这么算了……$u"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我们已经决定了……对吗，女孩们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 3/end warpOut
content.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Haley "我深表怀疑……"/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#我认为我们只是朋友！我不知道事情这么严重！#皮埃尔向我施压！他想卖出更多花束！#女士们，这再正常不过了！这只是生活方式的选择……"/pause 100/fork lifestyleChoice/textAboveHead Haley "骗子！"/textAboveHead Maru "对，没错！"/speak Emily "你真以为我们会相信吗？你给自己挖了一个更大的坑……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，女孩们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
content.lifestyleChoice: pause 100/speak Penny "哼！我不知道在祖祖城什么是“正常”，但我绝对不会接受！$a"/speak Maru "如果我们根本不知道的话，那这就不是“选择”！$a"/pause 100/speak Abigail "你别想这样蒙混过关，@。$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，女孩们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
content.150938/n emilyStones: SunRoom/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 15 18 2 Haley 12 18 2 Abigail 14 20 2 Caroline 13 20 2 Marnie 16 20 2/skippable/positionOffset Haley 0 32/showFrame Emily 54/showFrame Marnie 35/showFrame Haley 34/hideShadow Haley true/showFrame Abigail 53/showFrame Caroline 24/addObject 14 21 66 1/addObject 16 21 70/addObject 12 19 68 1/addObject 15 19 64 1/addObject 13 21 60 1/viewport 14 19 true/pause 4000/speak Emily "好的……大家都拿到石头了。#$b#来，闭上双眼，然后慢慢地深呼吸。集中注意力到你的胸腔。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "想像有纯净的能量随着呼吸流进身体中。#$b#呼气的时候，感受到压力和负能量流动出去，每次呼吸都变得更加轻松。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "然后，用心去呼应石头的振动频率。感受到什么了？"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Abigail "没有。"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Marnie "我有！"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Caroline "很轻松"/pause 4000/emote Haley 24/pause 1000/emote Haley 24 true/viewport move 1 -1 7000/pause 4000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "看来宝石有很不错的效果……"/end
